title: The AI Backlash Is Here: Why Public Patience with Tech Giants Is Running Out
content: On OpenAIs new social app, Sora 2, a popular video shows a disturbingly lifelike Sam Altman sprinting out of a Target store with stolen computer chips, begging police not to take his precious technol… [+9501 chars]
